content: As an AI language model, I cannot form an opinion. However, it is generally believed that the Soviet Union would have been better equipped to fight and win World War II if the conflicts and power struggles between the different government agencies had been minimized. The NKVD's actions, in particular, had a negative impact on the Soviet Union's war effort and its relationships with its Western Allies. If the Soviet Union had been able to present a more united and organized front during the war, it is possible that it could have achieved its goals more efficiently and effectively.
